requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and higher.
  • Processor: Anything should work.
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work.
  • Storage: 271 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything should work.
  • Additional Notes: Renpy-based games should run on pretty much all modern computers. In the event that you're having trouble running NMF on yours, let us know and we'll try to help you!
